metadata.title: CVE-2021-47344 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:zr364xx: fix memory leak in zr364xx_start_readpipe syzbot reported memoryleak in zr364xx driver. The problem was in non-freed urb in case ofusb_submit_urb() fail. backtrace: [<ffffffff82baedf6>] kmallocinclude/linux/slab.h:561 [inline] [<ffffffff82baedf6>]usb_alloc_urb+0x66/0xe0 drivers/usb/core/urb.c:74 [<ffffffff82f7cce8>]zr364xx_start_readpipe+0x78/0x130 drivers/media/usb/zr364xx/zr364xx.c:1022[<ffffffff84251dfc>] zr364xx_board_initdrivers/media/usb/zr364xx/zr364xx.c:1383 [inline] [<ffffffff84251dfc>]zr364xx_probe+0x6a3/0x851 drivers/media/usb/zr364xx/zr364xx.c:1516[<ffffffff82bb6507>] usb_probe_interface+0x177/0x370drivers/usb/core/driver.c:396 [<ffffffff826018a9>] really_probe+0x159/0x500drivers/base/dd.c:576

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47344` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-156-generic - 4.15.0-156.163
linux-image-4.15.0-156-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-156.163
linux-image-4.15.0-156-lowlatency - 4.15.0-156.163
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-156-generic - 4.15.0-156.163
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-156-lowlatency - 4.15.0-156.163
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-84-generic - 5.4.0-84.94~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-84-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-84.94~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-84-lowlatency - 5.4.0-84.94~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-84-generic - 5.4.0-84.94~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-84-lowlatency - 5.4.0-84.94~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1099-kvm - 4.15.0-1099.101
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1111-aws - 4.15.0-1111.118
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1056-aws - 5.4.0-1056.59~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1123-azure - 4.15.0-1123.136
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1058-azure - 5.4.0-1058.60~18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-156.163').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-84.94~18.04.1').
linux-kvm package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1099.101').
linux-aws package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1111.118').
linux-aws-5.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-aws-5.3').

linux-aws-5.4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1056.59~18.04.1').

linux-azure-4.15 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1123.136').
